scripts.build: rustup target add wasm32-wasip1 && cargo build --release -p swc_plugin_react_jitter --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp target/wasm32-wasip1/release/swc_plugin_react_jitter.wasm .
scripts.build:debug: rustup target add wasm32-wasip1 && cargo build -p swc_plugin_react_jitter --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp target/wasm32-wasip1/debug/swc_plugin_react_jitter.wasm .
scripts.test:debug: TEST_DEBUG=true npm run build:debug && vitest run --testTimeout=0
